attributes.action: Allow maximum guests to attend weddings only if they have tested negative.
attributes.additional_details:
Its been proven so now let it be, there was thousands of people at a venue who all tested negative, football matches can now have fans so why can't weddings have maximum guests only with a negative test provided by each guest before hand, we're sick and tired of having to cancel all our suppliers and the venue we have put so much planning in to this and its now the second time Because we had to cancel last year because cases was to high.
We just was normality at our wedding is it to much to ask.
attributes.background: If wedding guests test negative and log it on the NHS website and prove to the venue with their response email to allow maximum guests to our weddings.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588937
